definitions.definition: A European aromatic perennial herb , Tanacetum parthenium (or Chrysanthemum parthenium or Pyrethrum parthenium ), having daisy -like flowers; valued as a traditional medicine , especially for headaches .

main_definition: A European aromatic perennial herb , Tanacetum parthenium (or Chrysanthemum parthenium or Pyrethrum parthenium ), having daisy -like flowers; valued as a traditional medicine , especially for headaches .
